VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiUrl.Name: API URL
VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiUrl.Hint: The URL of the OpenAI compatible API endpoint (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1/images/generations).
VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiKey.Name: API Key
VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiKey.Hint: Your API Key for the service.
VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiType.Name: API Type
VAN-GOGH.Settings.ApiType.Hint: Select the type of API endpoint to use. 'Image Generation' for standard DALL-E endpoints, 'Chat Completion' for LLMs that generate images.
VAN-GOGH.Settings.Model.Name: Model
VAN-GOGH.Settings.Model.Hint: The model to use for image generation (e.g., dall-e-3).
VAN-GOGH.Workbench.DropHint: Drag and drop items here to add them to the queue.
